description: Monitor for process creation events in virtual machines that are associated with cloud VM agents, such as the WindowsAzureGuestAgent.exe process on Azure virtual machines. (Citation: Mandiant Azure Run Command 2021) Analytic 1 - Unexpected process creation sourcetype=process_creation | search process_name IN ("WindowsAzureGuestAgent.exe", "ssm-agent.exe") | where process_name IN ("WindowsAzureGuestAgent.exe", "ssm-agent.exe") AND process_path != "/usr/local/bin/"

external_references.description: Adrien Bataille, Anders Vejlby, Jared Scott Wilson, and Nader Zaveri. (2021, December 14). Azure Run Command for Dummies. Retrieved March 13, 2023.
